address.zh-TW: 高雄市鳳山區中山路42號
address.en: No. 42, Zhongshan Rd, Fongshan District, Kaohsiung City

description.zh-TW: 高雄著名古剎，主祀觀世音菩薩。
description.en: A famous ancient temple in Kaohsiung, dedicated to Guanyin.

history.zh-TW: 創建於清朝，為鳳山地區信仰中心。
history.en: Founded in the Qing Dynasty, a major religious center in Fongshan.

address.zh-TW: 台南市中西區南門路2號
address.en: No. 2, Nanmen Rd, West Central District, Tainan City

description.zh-TW: 台灣最早的孔廟，文化古蹟。
description.en: The oldest Confucius temple in Taiwan, a cultural heritage site.

history.zh-TW: 創建於1665年，台灣儒學重鎮。
history.en: Founded in 1665, a major center of Confucianism in Taiwan.

address.zh-TW: 台南市中西區民族路二段212號
address.en: No. 212, Minzu Rd Sec. 2, West Central District, Tainan City

description.zh-TW: 台南著名古蹟，融合信仰與歷史。
description.en: A famous historical site in Tainan, blending faith and history.

history.en: Founded in 1653, with a long history.

address.zh-TW: 屏東縣東港鎮東隆街21號
address.en: No. 21, Donglong St, Donggang Township, Pingtung County

description.zh-TW: 以迎王平安祭典聞名的王爺廟。
description.en: Famous for its Wangye festival, a major temple in Donggang.

history.zh-TW: 創建於1706年，屏東重要信仰中心。
history.en: Founded in 1706, a major religious center in Pingtung.
